enum: 10 - Relocated to another city or town

primaryEmailVerified.description: Indicates whether the user has verified his primary email (or) not. Default value is false.

privacyHoldEnabled.description: PII data for this Student record should not be anonymized if this flag is set to true

visaRefused.description: Indicates whether the user's visa has ever been refused or not. Default value is false.

detailedScore.description: Detailed score of the test. Fields will change according to the test type

protectionVisaInAnyCountry.description: Indicates whether the user has a protection visa in any country or not. Default value is false.
